description: Map of I/O ports. SB_BASE refers to the base I/O port of the Sound Blaster portion. SBCD_BASE refers to base I/O port of the Sound Blaster 2.0 CD interface. MPU_BASE refers to the base I/O of the MPU-401 UART

table columns.name: rw
table columns.title: R/W
table columns.description: I/O port direction, read, write, or read/write

table columns.name: card
table columns.title: Card
table columns.description: Card or cards associated with the I/O port
